thread.title: BRIEF-Focus Media Information Technology Expects 2017 Net Profit To Rise 33.7-35.9 Percent Y/Y

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Focus Media Information Technology Expects 2017 Net Profit To Rise 33.7-35.9 Percent Y/Y

organizations.name: focus media information technology co ltd

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Focus Media Information Technology Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT EXPECTS 2017 NET PROFIT TO RISE 33.7-35.9 PERCENT Y/Y FROM 4.45 BILLION YUAN ($681.78 million) YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2AMLwd3 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5270 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
